content:
What OS are you using ? What version of Thunderbird are you using?

Where did you get the download/install of Thunderbird? Did you get it from eg: Windows App Store, Snap, Flatpak or somewhere else ? Or download from official website : https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/all/ Or is it a 'portable Thunderbird' ?

Are emails in a Pop or Imap account? Do you download full copies or just headers? Do you have the profile folders in the standard default location or somewhere else like on OneDrive or NAS etc ?

I ask those questions because it sounds like the emails are not immediately available - as if there is a link to them.

re :I'm unable to select "Reply," I presume you are right click on email in Message List and select clicking on the top level set of icons - the second icon in from the left.

If threading is enabled and you right click on a collapsed thread then 'Reply' etc is not an available item.

I'm using 'Thunderbird Extended Support Release' (ESR) version 128.8.1esr 64bit also testing in Beta 137.0b3 I'm not having any problem regardless of whether Message Pane is open or not.
creator: Toad-Hall

content: oh thank you,I'll try it

Setting up self-hosted email is sometimes a problem, usually when the web host's server is not properly configured. If you will post screenshots of your incoming server settings pane (account settings>server settings) and your SMTP server settings pane, we may be able to offer suggestions. Most web hosts offer secure and insecure settings options that are posted in their cpanel components. Thank you.

content:
For us to better investigate this issue, we will need some more information.

Could you please do the following?

  1. Open the menu > Help > Troubleshooting Information, then click Copy text to Clipboard.
  2. Go to https://pastebin.mozilla.org/, paste the clipboard by right clicking in the large text area, select paste from the menu, change the retention period to expire in 28 days, use the Paste Snippet button to create a page containing your info, then copy the resulting URL (address) of the page created.
  3. Open a reply to this post, and paste the URL to your troubleshooting information you just copied.
  4. Please also provide results for the following test on your system
    • Does Thunderbird work as expected in Thunderbird troubleshooting mode?
    • Does Thunderbird work as expected with your OS started in safe mode with Networking. Instructions for each operating system: Windows 10/11, Windows 8, Windows 7, OSX
creator: MattAuSupport

content: I suggest you log on to the online account and confirm that messages are there. If this is an IMAP account, the message folders should repopulate. also, you can rightclick on a folder, click properties and then click repair. If the problem was a corrupted index, that will fix it.

content: - be sure that settings>privacy&security is set to accept cookies - on setting up the account, enter your name and email address and nothing more. Thunderbird will confirm the server settings for you. do not enter password until Google asks for it.

content:
Assuming this is an Imap account In Folder Pane

  • Right click on the imap mail account name folder and select 'Subscribe'
  • click on 'Refresh'
  • select the 'Sent' folder and click on 'Subscribe'
  • click on 'OK'

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: What you are doing is what I routinely recommend. When you copy IMAP messages, you are really downloading to PC and then uploading to the other IMAP account, yet IMAP was never designed for large uploads. The concurrent download and upload puts a strain on thunderbird. By separating the tasks, as you do with 'save as', you reduce the load.
creator: davidsk

content: Please understand that Thunderbird is just an agent; the rejection of your password is a message transmitted to you by thunderbird that comes from your email provider. You can access and change or delete the password by going to settings>privacy&security, clicking savedpasswords and then showpasswords. My suggestion is to then delete the rows for that account and click to get messages. At that point, thunderbird has no password on file, so you should be then prompted.
creator: davidsk

content:
Kedves Csaba!

Nem tudom hogyan vetted fel a fiókodat, de a Gmail tudtommal kétféleképpen működik a Thunderbirddel:

  • külön alkalmazásjelszóval (ilyenkor értelemszerűen ez nem a fiókod jelszava)
  • OAuth használatával, ilyenkor böngészőablakban adod meg a jelszavad a Google-felé, a Thunderbird csak egy tokent tárol helyben.

A legegyszerűbb megoldás (bár eltart egy ideig) talán az, hogy eltávolítod a fiókodat, és újból hozzáadod.

Üdv, Balázs

content:
How do you know it's not going to the recipient? If you entered a 'TO' email address and it wasn't your email address then it went to the recipient. However, a copy may have been sent to yourself if you Cc'd yourself in any emails your sent.

In Account Settings Select 'Copies & Folders' for the effected account Under 'when sending messages....' Did you select the 'Cc' or 'Bcc' checkbox and input your own email address ? This would mean you get sent a copy of the email.

content:
Globálna databáza je indexovací systém umožňujúcí Thunderbirdu vyhľadávať v správach. Znovuvytvorenie globálnej databázy preindexuje správy a vizitky z adresára. (Správy z konferencií nie sú indexované.)

Postup znovuvytvorenia globálnej databázy: - Ukončite Thunderbird. - Vyhľadajte vo svojom profile Thunderbirdu súbor global-messages-db.sqlite - Odstráňte tento súbor. - Spustite Thunderbird. Automaticky sa začne proces vytvárania indexu. V závislosti na počte správ môže indexácia trvať dosť dlhý čas. Počas indexácie môžete Thunderbird používat, iba bude znížený jeho výkon a vyhľadávania prinesú iba čiastočné výsledky, alebo dokonca žiadne. Proces indexácie môžete sledovať v Správcovi aktivít (ponuka Nástroje > Správca činnosti).
creator: Ansamb

content: V mnohých prípadoch pomôže opraviť priečinok, - kliknite na priečinok pravým tlačidlom myši a zvoľte "Vlastnosti" a zvoľte "Opraviť priečinok": http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/09/23/Thunderbird_opravit_priecinok.jpg - postupne opravte aj ostatné priečinky Potom je nutné ešte "Vykonať údržbu priečinkov".: - Thunderbird - Súbor - Vykonať údržbu priečinkov: http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/08/19/Thunderbird_udrzba_priecinkov.jpg
creator: Ansamb

content:
In 'Address Book'

  • Select 'Collected Addresses'
  • Click on any contact in the 'Collected Addresses' address book so list has focus.
  • Then use 'Ctrl+A' keys - this should highlight all the contacts in that address book
  • Right click on the highlighted contacts and select 'Delete'
creator: Toad-Hall
